interpretation:
Opener has 13-21 points and 5+ hearts.
Denies 1NT opening.

hints.hint0:
3 hearts for support
Small=6-9, Medium=10-12, Large=13+
hints.hint1:
Two support bids that look for a singleton/void
2 over 1 suit must be lower than opening suit
hints.hint2:
Support
	0-5: Pass
	6-10: 2H
	0-9, single/void, 5+: 4H
	11-12: 3H (Major Limit Raise)
	13+, single/void, 4+: DJS (Splinter)
	12+, 4H, balanced: 2NT (Jacoby 2NT)
	13+: 2Mi (2 over 1)
No Support
	0-5: Pass
	6-12, 4+S: 1S
		Default: 1NT
	15-17, 2H, balanced: 3NT
	13+: 2Mi (2 over 1)
